timeline.message: Add javadoc example and unit test for composing set via CodeWriter.onSection() and inline section notation.

timeline.bodyText: Oh, looks like this needs either a trailing newline, or you need to disable newlines in the writer
timeline.author: mtdowling

replies.bodyText: I've pushed up a fix. I also moved this test to smithy-utils.
